long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simplifies task and event management by automatically extracting task and event details—such as titles, start and end times—from various calendar and task management websites. The extracted data is then sent to your OE Dashboard, where it’s organized and optimized for efficient scheduling and task handling.

Whether you're managing multiple jobs or keeping track of various personal tasks, this tool helps you streamline your workflow by automating data extraction, making it easier to stay on top of your schedule.
